item.title: India's Ban on Encrypted Messaging Apps: A Disturbing Assault on Privacy and Free Speech
item.description: Blog Privacy, Free Speech, Encryption India's Ban on Encrypted Messaging Apps: A Disturbing Assault on Privacy and Free Speech India's ban on encrypted messaging apps undermines privacy and free speech, setting a dangerous precedent for democracy and citizens' rights. Reading Time Mins View Views Publish Date June 27, 2023 India’s Ban on Encrypted Messaging Apps ‚ÄúPrivacy is not a privilege, it is a fundamental right.‚Äù - Edward Snowden In a shocking move, India, once hailed as the world’s largest democracy, has taken a giant leap towards eroding privacy and stifling free speech by banning encrypted messaging apps on a massive scale.

item.title: About
item.description: ABOUT Welcome to my About page. Introduction Welcome to my portfolio! My name is Rahul Setrakian, and I am a versatile professional specializing in web development, software development (primarily Python), network administration, content creation, digital marketing, and basic cybersecurity. With a passion for programming and a drive for continuous learning, I bring a diverse set of skills and expertise to the table. Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to work on various projects and collaborate with clients from different industries.

item.title: Contact
item.description: CONTACT Get in touch with me. Contact If you have any questions or inquiries, feel free to reach out to me: Work Hours Monday - Saturday 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Contact Info Telegram: @anonymouscharon Email: rahulsetrakian@gmail.com Message Me Send Message Social Media
